Patients randomize one two standard prophylaxis treatment use Sinai Hospital : 1 . Arixtra ( 2.5 mg SQ/QD ) subcutaneous injection daily 2 week follow aspirin 325 mg 5 week , 2 . Pneumatic compression stocking ( MCS , Active Care , medical compression system Inc. , Israel ) 2 week concomitant Aspirin 325 mg daily 5 week .
